Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to improving safety for third-party food deliveries
Summary: Prohibits third-party food delivery platforms from employing algorithms that promote unsafe operation of e-bikes and scooters to improve safety for third-party food deliveries.
LawCode: Add ยง391-x, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to improving safety during third-party food deliveries by bicycles with electric assist or electric scooter
